TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ManagementRemoveAttribute extends System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementMemberAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class ManagementRemoveAttribute Inherits ManagementMemberAttribute

summary.span: The ManagementRemoveAttribute is used to indicate that a method cleans up an instance of a managed entity.

span.span: The ManagementRemoveAttribute is used to indicate that a method cleans up an instance of a managed entity.

summary.span: Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries.

summary.span: The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Die Methode darf keinen Parameter und muss einen Typ "void" zurückgeben.The method must not have any parameters and must return a void type. Verwendung dieses Attributs muss bei der Registrierung des WMI-Klasse in das Repository keine Wirkung.Use of this attribute does not have any affect on registration of the WMI class in the repository. Es wird nur zur Laufzeit verwendet.It is only used at runtime.

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that defines the type of output that the object that is marked with the ManagementRemove attribute will output.

value.span: Ein -Wert, der den Typ der Ausgabe angibt, die das Objekt mit dem Remove-Attribut markierten ausgegeben wird.

span.span: A value that indicates the type of output that the object marked with the Remove attribute will output.
